# contentful_apikey (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "contentful_apikey" "myapikey" {
  space_id = "space-id"

  name = "api-key-name"
  description = "a-great-key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **name** (String)
- **space_id** (String)

### Optional

- **description** (String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **access_token** (String)
- **version** (Number)
